verses.content: Hieng hi David thuhril nuhnung tak a nih, Jesai naupa David chun a hril a; “Insângtaka dawm sânga, Jakob Pathien hrieknâl, Israelhai hla mawitak phuoktu chun a hril a;
LALPA thlarau chun keima mi hmangin a hril a, A thu chu ka leiah a um a.
Israelhai Pathien chun a hril a, Israelhai lungpui chun: ‘Mi chunga feltaka rorêl hlaka, Pathien ṭi puma rorêl hlak chu,
Nisa a hung suok a, sûm um dêr lo, Zîng khawvar ang hi nîng a ta; Raw sûr zoa khuo hung inthienga, Hnuoia hlohna inder no hlap ang hi nîng a tih.
Ei sûngkuo chu Pathien kuoma inthawk a ni naw am a nih? Chatuon thuthlung ka kuomah a thlung a; Iengkim fel le suknghet tlatin; Ka sandamna kim le duthusâm kim, Ân der suoktir naw ding maw?
Mi rilohai chu an rênga a hnâwla hnâwlhmang mi, hling ang nîng an ta, Kuta lâk mi an ni si nawh.
A tâwktu ding chun thîr le fei ngul ruoi lem ding a na, Chuongchun, an hmuna raw- hmang vawng nîng an tih,’ tiin a mi biek a,” tiin.
Hieng hi David sipai huoisenhai hming chu a nih; Takemon mi Joseb-bassebeth chu sipai hotuhai laia hotu tak a na, ama chu ṭum khata mi za riet thattu Aznit mi Adino an ti bawk kha a nih.

Chun, a dawttu chu Aho mi naupa Dodai naupa Eleazar a na, ama chu Philistin mihai indo dinga an pungkhâwm a, an cho a, Israel mihai an fe hmang vawng laia David kuoma sipai huoisen pathumhai laia pakhat kha a nih.

Ama chu a tho a, Philistin mihai chu kut kham rak khawpin, a kâwlhnâm khawm inlet theilo rak khawpin a that a, chu ni chun LALPAIN nasatakin a ngampêk a; chun, mipuihai chu a hnungah râllâk thil la ding ngawtin an hung kîr nâwk a.
Chun, chu dawttu chu Hara mi, Agee naupa Samma a na. Dailuo umna hmunah Philistin mihai chu lâk tumin an inkhâwm a, chun, mipuihai chun Philistin mihai chu an tlânsiet san a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu chu hmuna chun a ngîr a, a vêng tlat a, Philistin mihai chu a that a, chun, LALPAIN nasatakin a ngampêk a.
Chun, sipai huoi sâwmthum laia pathumhai chu an zu feh a; bu sîk lai takin David kuomah Adullam pûkah an feh a; chun, Philistin sipai- hai chun Rephaim kâwnah ṭhang- hmun an khuor a.
Chuong lai chun David chu kulbîngah a um a, chuong lai bawk chun Philistin sipaihai chu Bethle- hemah an um a.
Chun, David chun tui a châk êm êm el a, “Bethlehema tuisunsuo tui, kul kawtkhâr kâwla mi kha dâwn dinga mi pe um ta ve hai sienla aw,” a ta.

Chuongchun, sipai huoisen pathumhai chun, Philistin sipaihai chu an nêr thleng a, kul kawtkhâr kâwla mi, Bethlehema tuisunsuo chu an va thâl a; an chawi a, David kuomah an fepui a, nisienlakhawm, a lo dâwn nuom nawh a, LALPA ta dingin a bunthlâk ta lem a.
“Aw LALPA, hi hi ka thaw naw dingzie chu, thi huoma fehai thisen chu ka dâwn ding am a nih?” a ta; chuongchun, a dâwn nuom ta nawh a. Chuong thilhai chu sipai huoisen pathumhai chun an thaw a nih.
Zeruia naupa Joab unaupa Abisai chu sâwmthumhai laia hotu tak a na, ama chun za thumhai chunga chun a fei chu a phawi a, anni chu a that a, Pathumhai laia chun hming ṭhat a hlaw a.
Sâwmthumhai laia chun chawimawi tlâk tak a ni naw am a nih? Chuleiin, an hotuah an siem a, nisienlakhawm, a chunghnung tak pathum laia tiemsa a kai nawh.
Chun, Kabzeel mi huoi naupa Jehoiada naupa Benaia thil nasatak thawtu chun Moab mi Ariel naupasal pahnihai chu a that a; chun, a zu feh a, vûr tlâk hun laiin khursûngah sakeibaknei a zu that bawk a.
Chun, Aigupta mi, mi lientak a that a; Aigupta mi chun a fei a chawi a, nisienlakhawm, ama chun hmawl chawiin a zuk pan a, Aigupta mi fei chawi chu a lâkpêk a, ama fei ma chun a sun hlum tah a.
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chun chuong ang thil chu a thaw leiin sipai huoisen pathumhai laia chun hming- ṭhat a hlawh a.
Mi sâwmthumhai nêk chun chawimawi tlâk a ni hrim a, nisienla- khawm, achunghnung tak pathum- hai laia tiemsa a kai nawh. Chun, David chun ama vêngtu hotuah a sieh a.
Joab unaupa Asahel chu sâwmthumhai laia pakhat chu a na; Bethlehem khuoa mi Dodo naupa Elhanan,
Harod mi Samma, Harod mi Elika,
Palti mi Helez, Teko a mi Ikkes naupa Ira,
Anathoth mi Abiezer, Husath mi Mebunnai,
Aho mi Zalmon, Netophath mi Maharai,
Netophath mi Baana naupa Heleb, Benjamin thla Gibea khuoa mi Ribai naupa Ittai,
Pirathon mi Benaia, Gaas vadungtea mi Hiddai;
Arbath mi Abi-albon, Barhum mi Azmaveth;
Saalbon mi Eliaba, Jasen nau- pahai laia Jonathan;
Harar mi Samma, Arar mi Sarar naupa Ahiam;
Maakath mi Ahasbai naupa Eliphelet, Gilon mi Ahithophel naupa Eliam;
Karmel mi Hezro, Arba mi Paarai;
Zoba khuoa mi Nathan naupa Igal, Gad mi Bani;
Zeruia naupa Joab râlthuom chawitu Ammon mi Zelek, Beeroth mi Naharai;
Ithra mi Ira, Ithra mi Gareb;
Hit mi Uria, an rêng chun sawmthum le pasari an nih.
